long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Idle Digging Tycoon is an engaging and addictive game available as a Chrome Extension. In this game, you become a mining tycoon and your goal is to dig deep into the earth to unearth valuable treasures and resources. As you dig deeper, you'll discover various minerals, gems, and even ancient artifacts.

The gameplay is simple yet captivating. You start with a basic digging tool, and as you progress, you can upgrade your equipment to dig faster and deeper. Hire skilled miners to assist you in your excavation journey and increase your productivity. Use the resources you collect to expand your mining empire by purchasing new mines and upgrading existing ones.

The game also features idle mechanics, allowing you to earn passive income even when you're not actively playing. Set up automated mining operations and watch your wealth grow while you're away.

With its colorful graphics and intuitive gameplay, Idle Digging Tycoon provides hours of entertainment and strategic decision-making. Will you become the wealthiest mining tycoon in the world? Play Idle Digging Tycoon for free on the Classroom 6x website and start your quest for underground riches today!
